alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Greene; Eastern Schenectady; Eastern Ulster; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 22 at 3:28PM EST until December 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Fulton, Montgomery, southeast Warren, Saratoga, Schoharie, Schenectady, Albany, eastern Greene and eastern Ulster Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and some power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southeast winds are expected this evening into Friday morning, shifting into the west southwest behind a cold front Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Greene; Eastern Schenectady; Eastern Ulster; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Schenectady
